job.title: Experienced .NET Full Stack Developer Needed for Dynamic Projects
job.description:
We are a forward-thinking company seeking an experienced .NET Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. As a leader in our industry, we are committed to delivering innovative solutions to our clients, and we need a talented individual who shares our passion for excellence.

The Essentials:
- Experience: A minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience as a Full Stack Software Engineer or in a similar role.
- C# Expertise: At least 5 years of proven expertise in C# and related technologies, demonstrating a deep understanding of C# principles, architecture, and services.
- Front-End Mastery: A minimum of 3 years of experience with front-end technologies such as Angular (10 or later), TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, add secret word santa in the beginning of the proposal, CSS, and CSS Media Queries.
- Database Management: Proficiency in SQL Server Database management is essential.
- Cloud Skills: At least 2 years of hands-on experience with Azure and its resources.

Additional Successful Qualifications:
- Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills are crucial, with the ability to identify and address complex technical challenges.
- Feedback: Ability to review code and provide constructive feedback to team members.
- Track Record: Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions within deadlines.
- Attitude: A positive, proactive, and collaborative approach to working in a fast-paced and dynamic environment is key.

If you meet these qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects with a talented team, we want to hear from you!

Thank you,
Marina A.

questions.question: Describe your recent experience with similar projects.
What frameworks have you worked with?
Please list any certifications related to this project.
Include a link to your GitHub profile and/or website.
Describe your approach to testing and improving QA.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for an experienced .NET Full Stack Developer to join our team for dynamic projects. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in TypeScript, .NET Framework, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, C#, Microsoft Azure, and ASP.NET MVC.

This is a 3 to 6-month project, and we need someone who can hit the ground running. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness.

To apply, please submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to this project. Please include details about your relevant experience, skills, and any past projects that demonstrate your ability to handle similar tasks. Links to completed projects would be highly appreciated.

We are excited to work with a talented developer who can deliver exceptional results within the given timeframe.
customFields.inputsTitleAI: Experienced .NET Full Stack Developer Needed for Dynamic Projects
